code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{getByIdCourse}from'../api/apiCourse';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Course=()=>{const[title,setTitle]=useState('');const[text,setText]=useState('');const[youtube,setYoutube]=useState('');let{id}=useParams();useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{const data=await getByIdCourse(id);setTitle(data.title);setText(data.text);setYoutube(data.youtube);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetch course');}};fetchData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"divGlav",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{className:"center",children:["\u041A\u0443\u0440\u0441: ",title]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"font-size-30",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{className:"font-size-40",children:"Description: "}),text]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"font-size-30",children:["Youtube: ",youtube]})]});};export default Course;
